U

updateQuestion(String, String, String, String, String, byte) - Method in class millionaire.View.Gui
It passes the question that will be shown to the PlayContent class (window will be shown during the match). see QuestionArea.updateQuestion(String, String, String, String, String, String, byte)
It updates PriceTable also (the table that show question order and its prize).
updateQuestion(String, String, String, String, String, String, byte) - Method in class millionaire.View.QuestionArea
It update question area (show a question with its alternatives and update player balance.)
used - Variable in class millionaire.View.LifeLine
It stores a boolean value that show if a life line have used (true) or not (false).
useLifeLine(String) - Method in class millionaire.Controller
Calls the different lifeline methods in game class and send the result to the lifelinearea or the questionarea.
